text: The extension unexpectedly got corrupted and after repairing it, all my saved tab windows (some of which I had saved for years) were now gone and I have no way of retrieving them again
Simple, easy clean, works perfectly. I just press one button and everything open is saved, no unnecessary setup.
Great work. Simple and easy to use. It would be even better if you could name your savings. But thank you so far
Very useful extension. Suggestion: make it possible to save just one tab at a time. (I rarely need to save all my tabs at once.)
Nice app! Please add oportunity open saved tabs in incógnito and use shift to open backgroung tabs from saved.
very nice extension! though is there a way to name the saved tabs? it would be a nice feature especially if you have multiple tabs saved ^^
light, simple, and does exactly what it says
simple and clean, u should own it. Look forward to sync to cloud in v2.0.
Awesome extension. Very helpful

my pal al(abraham). made this great extension which is really helpful .. like when u r watching p**n n stuff.. and if uwant to go to the same video that made u orgasmic  .. al is the guy for u ... cheers
Great work. I love how you can open all the tabs in a window with a single click.
Great extension. Can you have it sync across multiple devices? The Delete All button's position can also lead to accidentally deleting all tabs.
This is great. Please allow selection of the entire window. If I have 10 tabs in one window I have to select each one. I should be able to just select the Window instead from the list.

i love this extention because i be forgeting things and so with this extention i just save it for later and when i have to go back i just go to the extention and bring it back up. Very useful  and  helpful. you'll love it.
very good
Always wanted this feature on Chrome and finally able to effortlessly save my tabs and reopen them later. Does the job very well. Highly recommended! Kudos to the developer :D

Vvery use full & must have extension. You can store as many sessions & windows you want where as chrome allows you to restore only one recent session(which is kind of useless. I can get them via history itself :P)
3 cheers to the developer for saving us & our tabs ;) .
A very handy extension that makes you productive. Its a "must have" for students.
a great extension. always wanted something like this. used to struggle a lot during projects. this extension comes to the rescue. Great work. Highly recommend to download

I am using it right now. It's a great tool to save the pages you currently have open. Very useful when I need to save multiple pages for a project I will have to come back to. It's a one-click solution and keeps my bookmarks uncluttered.

Go Ahead!!
